Generation V.Black: When it is angered, the temperature of its head tuft reaches 600° F . It uses its tuft to roast berries.
Generation V.White: This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600° F .
Generation V.Black 2: Very intelligent, it roasts berries before eating them. It likes to help people.
Generation V.White 2: Very intelligent, it roasts berries before eating them. It likes to help people.

Generation VI.X: Very intelligent, it roasts berries before eating them. It likes to help people.
Generation VI.Y: This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600 degrees Fahrenheit .
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Very intelligent, it roasts berries before eating them. It likes to help people.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600 degrees Fahrenheit .

Generation V.Black: Pinwheel Forest (inner) and Lostlorn Forest ( rustling grass ) Received in the Dreamyard (if the player's first partner Pokémon was Oshawott )
Generation V.White: Pinwheel Forest (inner) and Lostlorn Forest ( rustling grass ) Received in the Dreamyard (if the player's first partner Pokémon was Oshawott )
Generation V.Black 2: Pinwheel Forest (inner) and Lostlorn Forest ( rustling grass )
Generation V.White 2: Pinwheel Forest (inner) and Lostlorn Forest ( rustling grass )
